name: BridgeTalk
description: A minimal, task-focused client for OpenClaw Gateway with multi-agent management and local data persistence
tagline: Bridge the gap between you and AI agents

purpose.problem: OpenClaw Gateway's default UI lacks multi-agent management, persistent storage, and task-focused workflow
purpose.solution: BridgeTalk provides a task-centric interface with multi-agent support, SQLite persistence, and PWA capabilities

key_features.name: Task-First Mode
key_features.description: Conversations are organized around tasks, not simple chat logs
key_features.benefit: Better context management and task tracking

key_features.name: Multi-Agent Management
key_features.description: Manage multiple AI agents with different models and prompts simultaneously
key_features.benefit: Use specialized agents for different tasks

key_features.name: Local Persistence
key_features.description: All data stored in local SQLite database
key_features.benefit: Full privacy and offline access to conversation history

key_features.name: Mobile-First PWA
key_features.description: Installable Progressive Web App with responsive design
key_features.benefit: Use on any device, install to home screen

key_features.name: Sub-task Collaboration
key_features.description: Multiple agents can collaborate on complex tasks

key_features.name: Minimalist Design
key_features.description: Pure black and white interface with zero distractions

quickstart.install: git clone https://github.com/zhuamber370/bridgetalk.git && cd bridgetalk && pnpm install
quickstart.configure: cp .env.example .env && edit .env with your OpenClaw Gateway token

author: zhuamber370
